Key Match Events: Georgia took a deserved lead on the stroke of half-time with a penalty converted calmly by their striker, Georges Mikautadze
Equaliser for Czech Republic as their set-piece dominance continues. An out-swinging corner is bundled in by Patrik Schick
Miscellaneous Highlights: The draw leaves both sides on one point, having played two matches. Portugal and Turkey - who play later - are on three each
